title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website built using React and Vite showcasing projects, experience, and achievements with a modern, responsive UI.

title: Aquaculture Management System
description: An IoT-based aquaculture monitoring system using React Native and Flask to track water parameters, feed data to a cloud server, and provide real-time alerts and analytics.

title: Call Management System
description: Developed a system to manage calls and track incidents using MERN Stack, Twilio, and Google Drive API.

title: AyushOneStopPortal
description: Centralized resources for AYUSH Organization stakeholders, integrating PHP, XAMPP, MySQL, and APIs.

title: Learning Management System
description: Built an exclusive learning management system for organized content delivery using ReactJS, Django, and SQL.

title: Arduino based Advanced Touch Sensor
description: Developed a touch sensor using Arduino to detect gestures and multi-finger taps in water.

title: Enhancing Malware Detection and Classification with CNN
description: Developed a malware detection and classification framework using CNNs, achieving 98% accuracy for cybersecurity applications.

title: Data Analytics Project- Amazon Sales Dashboard
description: Created an interactive Amazon sales dashboard using Microsoft PowerBI, providing insightful data visualizations for enhanced decision-making.

title: Network Traffic Analysis and Anomaly Detection for DDOS attack
description: Developed a system to generate, filter, rate limit, and analyze network traffic using rule-based and machine learning approaches, achieving high accuracy in traffic classification.

title: Predicting Water Potability using R Studio
description: Conducted comprehensive data analysis on water potability dataset using R, performing statistical analysis, visualization, and hypothesis testing.

title: Captcha Recognition
description: Developed a system to generate, filter, rate limit, and analyze network traffic using rule-based and machine learning approaches, achieving high accuracy in traffic classification.
